inclusion.criterion: pituitary adenomas that need transnasal transsphenoidal surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients of either gender aged 18 to 70 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with rhinitis, sinusitis, deviated nasal septum, etc. that can cause nasal pain
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with medical history of digestive ulcer/gastrointestinal bleeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with heart disease, severe liver and kidney dysfunction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients allergic to NSAIDs or tramadol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who need long-term treatment of NSAIDs or analgesic for other reasons
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients whose postoperative paraffin pathology suggests non-pituitary adenoma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have not undergone transsphenoidal surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and underwent recent surgery. He takes only vitamin D and multivitamins post-surgery.
